section.name: Using the issue tracker
section.p:
To report a bug, or request a feature enhancement, go to:
http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla. When filling out a bug report or feature request, please follow these simple rules:

ul.li: Select Taglibs from the product list
Include the tag library where the problem exists
A way to reproduce the problem if possible
Any other information that may be pertinent

section.p: If you have developed a patch for the bug please attach it to the bug report. See http://jakarta.apache.org/site/source.html#Patches for information on how to create a patch.

section.name: Using the mailing list
section.p: You are always welcome to bring your problem or new idea to the mailing lists.
